title: Understanding Spiritual Needs
text: When clients ask about the meaning of their lives, they are often seeking support in understanding their spiritual needs. How can nurses provide this support?

title: Role of Compassionate Conversations
text: Consider how open and compassionate conversations can help clients explore their existential concerns. What role do these conversations play in addressing spiritual needs?

hintAnswer: Nurses can engage in open and compassionate conversations to explore these existential concerns, helping individuals use their spirituality to find purpose and meaning in their lives, even in the face of mortality
